The Freenet Project Inc is a non-profit 501(c)(3) corporation.

Donate!

Avoid Censorship

Freenet is a platform for censorship-resistant communication and publishing. It helps you to remain anonymous, and communicate without fear.

Host a Website

Need a website nobody can take over? That is hosted for free? That is very resistant to attacks? Publish it on Freenet!

Share Files

Upload a file to Freenet and anyone with the secret URL can access it.

Meet New People

People from all over the world use Freenet to communicate. Some of them do so anonymously. You might never hear their voices in the open.

Experiment with Exciting New Technology

Freenet is on the cutting edge of distributed routing research. The data storage provided by Freenet is a proving ground for a number of new distributed systems.

Improve the World

By using Freenet from the "free world" you help people in oppressive regimes share information. The more people use Freenet the easier it will be to obtain. Using it will also be less suspicious.

Share, Chat, Browse. Anonymously.

Download Freenet

What is Freenet?

Secret Identity

Create a secret identity so nobody knows who you are.

Browse Websites

Freenet is home to sites ranging from programming to sustainable living.

Forums

Ask questions and exchange ideas.

Publish

Publish anonymously without need for a server.

Share Files

Easy upload & download.

Platform

Write your own applications on the Freenet platform.

Resistant

Freenet has been designed to be resistant to attacks and censorship.

Distributed

No central points of failure, efficient caching of popular content.

Proven

Based on solid research and in practical use for 15 years.

Share, Chat, Browse. Anonymously.
